```{r }
library(terra)
path <- "data/features/worldclim/wc2.1_30s_bio"
```


```{r }
files <- list.files(path, full.names=TRUE)
predictors <- rast(files)
plot(predictors)
```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r}
df_trametes_sanguinea_bg <- read_csv("data/df_trametes_sanguinea_bg.csv")
df <- df_trametes_sanguinea_bg[, -3]
presvals <- extract(predictors, df)
df_features <- cbind(df_trametes_sanguinea_bg, presvals)

write.csv(df_features, "data/df_features_sta_fe.csv", row.names = TRUE)

```

Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
